name: Dear Genny
description:
On a quiet Saturday in September, Maria goes to her room to text her best friend, Genny, something very important.

Only, it might be too late to tell Genny and Maria doesn't have much in the way of courage.

Dear Genny is a short yuri Visual Novel for the O2A2 Jam (Again!).

Credits

  • Wannabe Cat as writer and programmer.
  • Shino: Character art.
  • Room Background: annako.
  • Soft Romance Gui: Jamie Scribbles.

Content Warning for instances of self loathing, food, drinks, and anxiety.

Total Word Count: 769.
